title: Al Pacino
review: He definitely grew into his shell as a mean mobster guy from his humble godfather beginnings. Great film

title: Great crime thriller
review: Freeman and Pitt are a formiddible combo in this bleak dystopian crime film about a serial killer who kills in the name of 7 deadly sins. Such a unique concept.

title: Favorite
review: Definitely my favorite film of all time. Suspensefiul, funny, action packed and thrilling film that takes some unexpected twists and turns

movie_title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
title: Over 1 bln dollars in sales...
review: Hard to believe this episode of the series made so much. The plot wasn't particularly exciting. The series has become heavily monopolised and not at all what George Lucas' vision of Star Wars once was. Such a shame. In saying that, the special effects and every other element of an ideal film were there.

title: Love it
review: Such a great film. Tucker and Willis are the stars in my book! Comedy and fantasy sci fi all rolled into one!

title: Multiple feels
review: You'll laugh, cry and be on the edge of your seat. Tom Hanks does a beautiful job in this classic

title: magnificent
review: Malek portrayed Freddy perfectly and the film as a whole plucked some emotional heartstrings while playing all our favorite classic queen songs

title: Credit is due but not the best
review: While the actors and director did a fine job - this film did lose my focus at times with slow pacing and a lot of still cinematography

title: Pioneering
review: This film paved the way for prison films and series of a similar style. The acting was beautifully done. A bit too long- my only gripe

title: Disturbing
review: This is one of the most disturbing films of last century next to the exorcist. Hopkins acting is perhaps too flawless in this psychological cannibal thriller

title: Best fight sequences
review: While the plot wasn't as compelling, the fight sequences in this film have never since been beat

title: Ouch
review: Joe Pesci is a beast in this film! The ending was kind of a letdown though

title: Enjoyable
review: While the decision for best film is contentious - I still enjoyed this film with a message about treatment of another race. It's a comedic and sad reminder of how we shouldn't be in the modern era. Well acted and directed.

title: No story but great film
review: Can it be? A great film without much plot? Well Mad Max pulls it off. You won't be bored at any time despite the writing being minimal and heavily dependent on postproduction.
